sql.query: select distinct(perapp_oldid), upper(perapp_fname) as perappname, perapp_panno, org_name, to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid from com_demographics, applications, perapplicant, organisations where demo_appno=app_no and demo_comappid=perapp_id and demo_apptype='N' and perapp_branchcode=org_scode ^

select demo_appno, app_status, mailchkstatus, app_usrid, app_orglevel, app_applnholder, usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as appholdername, demo_comappid from com_demographics, applications, organisations, users where usr_id(+)=app_applnholder and demo_comappid in (^) and demo_appno = app_no and demo_apptype='N' and app_delflag='N' and app_orgcode=org_code order by demo_appno desc
select advcap_appno, advcap_sanctioncomments, rating, rating_grade,adv_ratecheck from adv_meanscapital where advcap_appno='^'
delete from adv_meanscapital where advcap_appno=?
insert into adv_meanscapital(advcap_appno, advcap_sanctioncomments, rating, rating_grade,adv_ratecheck)values(?,?,?,?,?)
select borrpow_activity, borrpow_totalborrowing, borrpow_resolution, borrpow_comments, borrpow_sanction from adv_borrowingpower where borrpow_appnumber='^'
insert into adv_borrowingpower(borrpow_appnumber, borrpow_activity, borrpow_totalborrowing, borrpow_resolution, borrpow_comments, borrpow_sanction) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from adv_borrowingpower where borrpow_appnumber=?
select adv_bowpayment, adv_local, adv_commit, adv_suppliers, adv_customer, adv_extentborrow, adv_natureborrow, adv_commtonstatusrep, adv_status_days from adv_commentsonstatus where adv_comappno='^'
delete from adv_commentsonstatus where adv_comappno=?

insert into adv_commentsonstatus(adv_comappno, adv_bowpayment, adv_local, adv_commit, adv_suppliers, adv_customer, adv_extentborrow, adv_natureborrow, adv_commtonstatusrep,adv_status_days) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select adv_accountno, adv_commenttype, adv_branchcomment, adv_sanctionofficecomment from adv_generalcomments where adv_accountno='^' and adv_commenttype='^'
delete from adv_generalcomments where adv_accountno=? and adv_commenttype=?
insert into adv_generalcomments(adv_accountno, adv_commenttype, adv_branchcomment, adv_sanctionofficecomment) values(?,?,?,?)
select adv_bohundi, adv_bohtype, adv_bohcomments from adv_borrowonhundi where adv_bohappno='^'
delete from adv_borrowonhundi where adv_bohappno=?
insert into adv_borrowonhundi(adv_bohappno, adv_bohundi, adv_bohtype, adv_bohcomments) values(?,?,?,?)
select adv_dishonortype, adv_disnoofdis, adv_disrangeamt, adv_disreasons from adv_dishonours where adv_disappno='^'
delete from adv_dishonours where adv_disappno=?
insert into adv_dishonours(adv_disappno, adv_dishonortype, adv_disnoofdis, adv_disrangeamt, adv_disreasons) values(?,?,?,?,?)
select advcol_appno, advcol_sno, advcol_descproperty, advcol_propertyownded, advcol_marketvalue, advcol_encumbrance,advcol_legalopinion from adv_collateralsecurity where advcol_appno='^'
delete from adv_collateralsecurity where advcol_appno=? and advcol_sno=?
select nvl(max(advcol_sno),0)+1 as advcol_sno from adv_collateralsecurity where advcol_appno='^'
insert into adv_collateralsecurity(advcol_appno, advcol_sno, advcol_descproperty, advcol_propertyownded, advcol_marketvalue, advcol_encumbrance, advcol_legalopinion)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update adv_collateralsecurity set advcol_descproperty=?, advcol_propertyownded=?, advcol_marketvalue=?, advcol_encumbrance=?, advcol_legalopinion=? where advcol_appno=? and advcol_sno=?
select lglheirs_sno, lglheirs_appno, lglheirs_name, lglheirs_gender, lglheirs_age, lglheirs_relationship, lglheirs_maritalstate from adv_legalheirs where lglheirs_appno='^'
select NVL(max(lglheirs_sno),0)+1 as snorelmax from adv_legalheirs where lglheirs_appno='^'
insert into adv_legalheirs (lglheirs_sno, lglheirs_appno, lglheirs_name, lglheirs_gender, lglheirs_age, lglheirs_relationship, lglheirs_maritalstate) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update adv_legalheirs set lglheirs_appno=?, lglheirs_name=?, lglheirs_gender=?, lglheirs_age=?, lglheirs_relationship=?, lglheirs_maritalstate=? WHERE lglheirs_sno=? and lglheirs_appno=?
delete from adv_legalheirs where lglheirs_sno=? and lglheirs_appno=?
select to_char(adv_guaranteedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as adv_guaranteedate, adv_amount, adv_guarantors, adv_sanction, adv_guarantorsrenewal from adv_guranteedetails where adv_appno='^'
delete from adv_guranteedetails where adv_appno=?
insert into adv_guranteedetails(adv_appno, adv_guaranteedate, adv_amount, adv_guarantors, adv_sanction, ADV_GUARANTORSRENEWAL) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?)

select a.perapp_fname, a.perapp_id, a.perapp_address1, a.perapp_address2, a.perapp_address3, a.perapp_city, a.perapp_state, a.perapp_zip, a.perapp_phone,d.city_name, e.state_name from perapplicant a, com_demographics b, laps_cities d,laps_states e where demo_appno='^' and city_code(+)=a.perapp_city and state_code(+)=a.perapp_state and perapp_id=demo_comappid and (demo_apptype like '%G@%')
select adv_othsno, ADV_OTHBANKFIN, ADV_OTHLIMIT, ADV_OTHAMT, ADV_OTHPAIDUPTO, ADV_OTHNOOFINSTAL, ADV_OTHTOTALAMT from adv_otherbank where ADV_OTHAPPNO='^'
delete from adv_otherbank where adv_othsno=? and ADV_OTHAPPNO=?
update adv_otherbank set ADV_OTHBANKFIN=?, ADV_OTHLIMIT=?, ADV_OTHAMT=?, ADV_OTHPAIDUPTO=?, ADV_OTHNOOFINSTAL=?, ADV_OTHTOTALAMT=? where ADV_OTHSNO=? and ADV_OTHAPPNO=?
insert into adv_otherbank(ADV_OTHAPPNO, ADV_OTHSNO, ADV_OTHBANKFIN, ADV_OTHLIMIT, ADV_OTHAMT, ADV_OTHPAIDUPTO, ADV_OTHNOOFINSTAL, ADV_OTHTOTALAMT) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(adv_othsno+1),1) as adv_othsno from adv_otherbank where ADV_OTHAPPNO='^'

select ADV_APPNO, to_char(ADV_turnoverfrom,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ADV_turnoverfrom, to_char(ADV_turnoverto,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ADV_turnoverto, ADV_particularcramt, ADV_particulardramt, ADV_monthcramt, ADV_monthcrdays,ADV_monthdramt, ADV_monthdrdays, ADV_sanction from adv_turnover where ADV_APPNO='^'

insert into adv_turnover (ADV_APPNO,ADV_turnoverfrom, ADV_turnoverto, ADV_particularcramt, ADV_particulardramt, ADV_monthcramt, ADV_monthcrdays, ADV_monthdramt, ADV_monthdrdays, ADV_sanction) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from adv_turnover where ADV_APPNO=?
select sno,adv_depositaccountsname, adv_depositaccountssbaccountno, adv_depositaccountsavgbal, adv_depositaccountspresentbal from adv_depositaccounts where adv_depositaccountno='^'
select nvl(max(sno+1),1) as sno from adv_depositaccounts where adv_depositaccountno='^'
insert into adv_depositaccounts (adv_depositaccountno, sno, adv_depositaccountsname, adv_depositaccountssbaccountno, adv_depositaccountsavgbal, adv_depositaccountspresentbal) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from adv_depositaccounts where adv_depositaccountno=? and sno=?

select termdeposits_sno, termdeposits_appno, to_char(termdeposits_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as termdeposits_date,termdeposits_name,termdeposits_amount, to_char(termdeposits_maturing,'dd/mm/yyyy') as termdeposits_maturing, termdeposits_encumbered, termdeposits_explain from adv_termdeposits where termdeposits_appno='^'
select NVL(max(termdeposits_sno),0)+1 as snorelmax from adv_termdeposits

insert into adv_termdeposits (termdeposits_sno, termdeposits_appno, termdeposits_date, termdeposits_name, termdeposits_amount, termdeposits_maturing, termdeposits_encumbered, termdeposits_explain) values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)

update adv_termdeposits set termdeposits_appno=?, termdeposits_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), termdeposits_name=?, termdeposits_amount=?, termdeposits_maturing=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), termdeposits_encumbered=?, termdeposits_explain=? WHERE termdeposits_sno=?
delete from adv_termdeposits where termdeposits_sno=?
select advconn_sno, advconn_name, advconn_branch, advconn_limit, advconn_amount, advconn_bal, advconn_otherdep from adv_connectedaccts where advconn_appno='^'
delete from adv_connectedaccts where advconn_appno=? and advconn_sno=?
update ADV_CONNECTEDACCTS set advconn_name=?, advconn_branch=?, advconn_limit=?, advconn_amount=?, advconn_bal=?, advconn_otherdep=? where advconn_appno=? and advconn_sno=?
select nvl(max(ADVCONN_SNO),0)+1 as ADVCONN_SNO from ADV_CONNECTEDACCTS where ADVCONN_APPNO='^'
insert into adv_connectedaccts(advconn_appno, advconn_sno, advconn_name, advconn_branch, advconn_limit, advconn_amount, advconn_bal, advconn_otherdep)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select adv_cclast12month, adv_ccprevious12month, adv_hyplast12month, adv_hypprevious12month, amount1, amount2, amount3, amount4, preamount1, to_char(predate1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as predate1, preamount2,to_char(predate2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as predate2 from adv_workingcapital where adv_appno='^'
delete from adv_workingcapital where adv_appno=?

insert into adv_workingcapital(adv_appno, adv_cclast12month, adv_ccprevious12month, adv_hyplast12month, adv_hypprevious12month, amount1, amount2, amount3, amount4, preamount1, predate1, preamount2, predate2) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select bill_accountno, bill_limit, bill_business, bill_presentos, bill_overdue, bill_type,bill_sno from adv_billpurchase where bill_accountno='^' order by bill_sno
delete from adv_billpurchase where bill_accountno=?
insert into adv_billpurchase(bill_accountno, bill_limit, bill_business, bill_presentos, bill_overdue, bill_type,bill_sno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Select liab_limit, liab_unsecured, liab_secured, liab_total, liab_option, liab_liabtype from ADV_Liabilities where liab_appno ='^' and liab_option='^' order by liab_liabtype
Select liab_limit,liab_unsecured,liab_secured,liab_total, liab_option, liab_liabtype from ADV_Liabilities where liab_appno ='^' order by liab_option, liab_liabtype
delete from ADV_Liabilities where liab_appno =? and LIAB_OPTION=?
insert into ADV_Liabilities (liab_appno, liab_limit, liab_unsecured, liab_secured, liab_total, liab_option, liab_liabtype) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select advcom_appno, advcom_stock, advcom_details, advcom_penalinterest, advcom_sanctionadvice, advcom_detailjust, advcom_limitdrawing, advcom_drawingextent, advcom_sanctionoffuse, advcom_cashwithdrawl, advcom_withdrwlextent, advcom_purposewithdrawl, advcom_purposedetails from adv_comments where advcom_appno='^'
delete from adv_comments where advcom_appno=?

insert into adv_comments(advcom_appno, advcom_stock, advcom_details, advcom_penalinterest, advcom_sanctionadvice, advcom_detailjust, advcom_limitdrawing, advcom_drawingextent, advcom_sanctionoffuse, advcom_cashwithdrawl, advcom_withdrwlextent, advcom_purposewithdrawl, advcom_purposedetails) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Select slno, doc_appno, doc_naturelimit, doc_name, doc_amount, to_char(doc_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_date, doc_remark from ADV_Document where doc_appno ='^'
insert into ADV_Document (slno,doc_appno, doc_naturelimit, doc_name, doc_amount, doc_date, doc_remark) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
select NVL(max(slno+1),1) as slno from ADV_Document
delete from ADV_Document where slno = ?
select Borrower_appno, Borrower_Exp, Borrower_restriction from ADV_BorrowerExperience where Borrower_appno = '^'
delete from ADV_BorrowerExperience where Borrower_appno = ?
insert into ADV_BorrowerExperience (Borrower_appno, Borrower_Exp, Borrower_restriction) values(?,?,?)
select adv_costofpro, adv_termfinance, adv_termcoverage from adv_termloancomments where adv_termappno='^'
delete from adv_termloancomments where adv_termappno=?
insert into adv_termloancomments(adv_termappno, adv_costofpro, adv_termfinance, adv_termcoverage) values(?,?,?,?)
select adv_workinventory, adv_workdeviation, adv_worklending, adv_workcomputation, adv_workrecommendation from adv_workcapitalcomments where adv_workappno='^'
delete from adv_workcapitalcomments where adv_workappno=?
insert into adv_workcapitalcomments(adv_workappno, adv_workinventory, adv_workdeviation, adv_worklending, adv_workcomputation, adv_workrecommendation) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
select ops_appno, ops_govtsponsor, ops_schemetype, ops_subsidyamt, ops_sponsoragency, ops_subsidytype, ops_income, ops_incomesrc, ops_residencein, ops_mobility from ops_subsidy where ops_appno='^'
delete from ops_subsidy where OPS_APPNO=?

insert into ops_subsidy(ops_appno, ops_govtsponsor, ops_schemetype, ops_subsidyamt, ops_sponsoragency, ops_subsidytype, ops_income, ops_incomesrc,ops_residencein, ops_mobility) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select ops_accountbusinessnature, ops_accountsectorcategory, ops_accountassetclassification from ops_accountdetails where ops_accountappno='^'
delete from ops_accountdetails where ops_accountappno=?
insert into ops_accountdetails(ops_accountappno, ops_accountbusinessnature, ops_accountsectorcategory, ops_accountassetclassification) values(?,?,?,?)
select not_appno, usr_fname||usr_mname||usr_lname as not_usrid, not_text, to_char(not_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as not_date from appnotes, users where not_appno='^' and usr_id=not_usrid
delete from appnotes where not_appno=?
insert into appnotes(not_usrid, not_appno, not_text, not_date) values(?,?,?,sysdate)
delete from appnotes where not_appno=? and not_usrid=? and not_date=?

select veh_id, veh_appno,veh_type,veh_virtual, veh_year_manu,veh_cost,veh_estimate, veh_fuel,veh_make, veh_mnth_inc, veh_details,veh_register,veh_persons, veh_load,veh_driven, veh_permit, veh_route_operation, veh_dealer_info from ops_vehicledetails where veh_appno='^'

select veh_id, veh_appno,veh_type,veh_virtual, veh_year_manu,veh_cost,veh_estimate, veh_fuel,veh_make, veh_mnth_inc, veh_details,veh_register,veh_persons, veh_load,veh_driven, veh_permit, veh_route_operation, veh_dealer_info from ops_vehicledetails where veh_id='^' and veh_appno='^'
select nvl(max(veh_id),0)+1 as veh_id from ops_vehicledetails where veh_appno='^'
delete from ops_vehicledetails where veh_appno=? and veh_id=?

update ops_vehicledetails set veh_type=?, veh_virtual=?, veh_year_manu=?, veh_cost=?, veh_estimate=?, veh_fuel=?,veh_make=?,veh_mnth_inc=?, veh_details=?, veh_register=?, veh_persons=?, veh_load=?, veh_driven=?, veh_permit=?, veh_route_operation=?, veh_dealer_info=? where veh_appno=? and veh_id=?

insert into ops_vehicledetails(veh_id, veh_appno, veh_type, veh_virtual, veh_year_manu, veh_cost, veh_estimate, veh_fuel, veh_make, veh_mnth_inc, veh_details, veh_register, veh_persons, veh_load, veh_driven, veh_permit, veh_route_operation, veh_dealer_info) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select perapp_id, perapp_title, perapp_fname from perapplicant, com_demographics where demo_appno=^ and perapp_id=demo_comappid
select demo_appno,demo_comappid,demo_finstandard,demo_industrycode,demo_indrating, demo_apptype,demo_finmodel from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_apptype!='N'
insert into com_demographics(demo_appno,demo_comappid,demo_finstandard,demo_industrycode,demo_indrating, demo_apptype,demo_finmodel) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id=^
select ssi_genid,ssi_genvalue from ssi_generaldetails where ssi_genappno='^' and ssi_tabname='^' and ^ order by ssi_genid
delete from ssi_generaldetails where ssi_genappno = ? and ssi_tabname = ? and ssi_genid in (?)
insert into ssi_generaldetails (ssi_genappno,ssi_genid,ssi_tabname,ssi_gendesc,ssi_genvalue) values(?,?,?,?,?)
update ssi_generaldetails set ssi_genvalue = ? where ssi_genappno = ? and ssi_genid = ? and ssi_tabname=? and ssi_gendesc = ?
select NVL(max(ssi_genid),0)+1 from ssi_generaldetails where ssi_genappno='^'
delete from ssi_generaldetails where ssi_tabname = ? and ssi_genappno = ?
delete from ops_inspectionreport where ins_appno=?
delete from ops_inspectionreport where ins_inwardno=?

select TO_CHAR(ins_dateofvisit,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ins_dateofvisit,ins_distance,ins_purpose,ins_amtreqd, ins_businessper,ins_natureofbusiness,ins_businessaddr,ins_prisecurity,ins_collsecurity,ins_presentbanker, ins_ourbranchname,ins_othrbankname,ins_ourloantype,ins_othrloantype,ins_ouramtsanc,ins_othramtsanc, TO_CHAR(ins_ourloandate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ins_ourloandate,TO_CHAR(ins_othrloandate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ins_othrloandate,ins_ourbalos,ins_othrbalos,ins_ouroverdue,ins_othroverdue,ins_kycpernameaddr, ins_kycperrelated,ins_kycpersincewhen,ins_appstayinaddr,ins_opiniongathered,ins_proppernameaddr, ins_propneighbour,ins_propinpossession,ins_proplocation,ins_officercomments,ins_landmarknorth, ins_landmarksouth,ins_landmarkeast,ins_landmarkwest,ins_inwardno from ops_inspectionreport where ins_appno='^'

select TO_CHAR(ins_dateofvisit,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ins_dateofvisit,ins_distance,ins_purpose,ins_amtreqd, ins_businessper,ins_natureofbusiness,ins_businessaddr,ins_prisecurity,ins_collsecurity,ins_presentbanker, ins_ourbranchname,ins_othrbankname,ins_ourloantype,ins_othrloantype,ins_ouramtsanc,ins_othramtsanc, TO_CHAR(ins_ourloandate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ins_ourloandate,TO_CHAR(ins_othrloandate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ins_othrloandate,ins_ourbalos,ins_othrbalos,ins_ouroverdue,ins_othroverdue,ins_kycpernameaddr, ins_kycperrelated,ins_kycpersincewhen,ins_appstayinaddr,ins_opiniongathered,ins_proppernameaddr, ins_propneighbour,ins_propinpossession,ins_proplocation,ins_officercomments,ins_landmarknorth, ins_landmarksouth,ins_landmarkeast,ins_landmarkwest,ins_inwardno from ops_inspectionreport where ins_inwardno='^'

insert into ops_inspectionreport(ins_appno, ins_dateofvisit, ins_distance, ins_purpose, ins_amtreqd, ins_businessper, ins_natureofbusiness, ins_businessaddr, ins_prisecurity, ins_collsecurity, ins_presentbanker, ins_ourbranchname, ins_othrbankname, ins_ourloantype, ins_othrloantype, ins_ouramtsanc, ins_othramtsanc, ins_ourloandate, ins_othrloandate, ins_ourbalos,ins_othrbalos, ins_ouroverdue, ins_othroverdue, ins_kycpernameaddr, ins_kycperrelated, ins_kycpersincewhen, ins_appstayinaddr, ins_opiniongathered, ins_proppernameaddr, ins_propneighbour, ins_propinpossession, ins_proplocation, ins_officercomments, ins_landmarknorth, ins_landmarksouth, ins_landmarkeast, ins_landmarkwest, ins_inwardno) values (?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from ops_inspectionfacility where ins_appno=?
delete from ops_inspectionfacility where ins_inwardno=?
insert into ops_inspectionfacility(ins_appno,ins_sno,ins_purpose,ins_type,ins_loanamount,INS_INWARDNO) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
select ins_appno,ins_sno,ins_purpose,ins_type,ins_loanamount,INS_INWARDNO from ops_inspectionfacility where ins_appno='^'
select ins_appno,ins_sno,ins_purpose,ins_type,ins_loanamount,INS_INWARDNO from ops_inspectionfacility where INS_INWARDNO='^'

select facility_sno, facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_application, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_margin, bplr, sec_charge from facility_master a,facilities b,fac_security_details where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_group='^' and sec_appno(+)=facility_appno and facility_category='R' and sec_facsno(+)=facility_sno order by facility_sno
select nvl(facility_months,0) as facility_months from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_group='0'
select LGLHEIRS_SNO,LGLHEIRS_NAME,LGLHEIRS_GENDER,LGLHEIRS_AGe, LGLHEIRS_RELATIONSHIP,LGLHEIRS_MARITALSTATE from ADV_LEGALHEIRS where LGLHEIRS_APPNO='^' and LGLHEIRS_SNO='^'
select ADV_OTHSNO,ADV_OTHBANKFIN,ADV_OTHLIMIT,ADV_OTHAMT,ADV_OTHPAIDUPTO, ADV_OTHNOOFINSTAL,ADV_OTHTOTALAMT from ADV_OTHERBANK where ADV_OTHAPPNO='^' and ADV_OTHSNO='^'
select SNO,ADV_DEPOSITACCOUNTSNAME,ADV_DEPOSITACCOUNTSSBACCOUNTNO,ADV_DEPOSITACCOUNTSAVGBAL, ADV_DEPOSITACCOUNTSPRESENTBAL from ADV_DEPOSITACCOUNTS where ADV_DEPOSITACCOUNTNO='^' and SNO='^'

select TERMDEPOSITS_SNO, to_char(TERMDEPOSITS_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TERMDEPOSITS_DATE,TERMDEPOSITS_NAME,TERMDEPOSITS_AMOUNT, to_char(TERMDEPOSITS_MATURING,'dd/mm/yyyy') as TERMDEPOSITS_MATURING ,TERMDEPOSITS_ENCUMBERED from adv_termdeposits where TERMDEPOSITS_APPNO='^' and TERMDEPOSITS_SNO='^'
select ADVCONN_SNO,ADVCONN_NAME,ADVCONN_BRANCH,ADVCONN_LIMIT,ADVCONN_AMOUNT,ADVCONN_BAL from ADV_CONNECTEDACCTS where ADVCONN_APPNO='^' and ADVCONN_SNO='^'
select liab_liabtype,liab_limit,LIAB_UNSECURED,LIAB_SECURED,LIAB_TOTAL from ADV_Liabilities where LIAB_APPNO='^' and liab_option='^' and liab_liabtype=^
select perapp_id, perapp_title, perapp_fname from perapplicant, com_demographics where demo_comappid='^' and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_appno='^'

select dueappno,duename,duefathusname,dueage,dueoccupation,dueyrsemploy,dueservice,dueresiaddr,dueofficeaddr,duepersoncontact,dueresiaddrvisited,dueyrsofresidence,duetypeofresidence,dueofficeaddrvisited,dueidentity,duegenuinesc,dueundertakingverified,dueundertakingauthority,dueitreturns,duepanidentity,duedocumentverified,duebnkstmtverified,apptitle,dueapplntrelated,dueknewsince,duepropdesc,duemarketability,dueobservations,duedatevisit,dueinspectorname,dueinspectordesign,dueinwardno,dueplace from duediligencereport where dueappno='^'
Select slno, doc_appno, doc_naturelimit, doc_name, doc_amount, to_char(doc_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_date, doc_remark from ADV_Document where doc_appno ='^' and slno='^'
